name: IRONMASH!
description:
A simple turn-based tactics game inspired by tabletop games such as Song of Blades and Heroes and Mordheim.

Prototype for /agdg/ demo day.

Controls:

  • Left mouse button for everything.
  • WASD/arrows/click and drag:  pan camera
  • Spacebar: end turn.
  • Numbers 1-6: contextual actions.
  • Don't forget to play the tutorial!

Gamemodes:

  • Deathmatch: The player who eliminates all enemy soldiers wins.
  • Regicide: The strongest unit of your race is hired for free as your warband leader. When it dies, it's owner loses the game.

Update for demo day 16:

  • New art and animations for the characters.
  • New skills.
  • (probably) better balance.
  • 2 completely new units.

Update for demo day 15:

  • Two new races: Orcs and Merfolks.
  • New maps.
  • Updated visuals.
  • A whole bunch of bug fixes.

Stuff to be added in later iterations:

  • more gamemodes
  • actual graphics
  • actual music and sounds
  • a decent AI
